      • setEndpointParameters

        protected void setEndpointParameters()
        Method which sets up the basic parameters for the endpoint. This does not include the order data.

      • getTimeInForceString

        protected java.lang.String getTimeInForceString(TimeInForce time)

      • getOrderSideString

        protected java.lang.String getOrderSideString(OrderTransactionType type)
        Method which parses the Order Side enum value. This should only return BUY or SELL
        Parameters:
        type -

      • verifyTickerData

        protected java.lang.String verifyTickerData(java.lang.String ticker)
                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Method which verifies that the ticker is a valid one. If not, throw an error. This method also supplies additional information of the Ticker symbol that the order class is required to use.
        Throws:
        InvalidTickerException
        java.lang.Exception
